label: Functionality issues
description: Problems related to the functioning and features of the software.

children.label: Text editing issues
children.description: Difficulties specifically related to text input, formatting, and typography within designs.

children.label: Image editing issues
children.description: Challenges with adding, altering, or manipulating images, including background removal and image resizing.

children.label: Feature completeness
children.description: Absence or inadequacy of features that users expect for their tasks, like grammar check or style consistency.

children.label: Asset availability
children.description: The absence or difficulty in finding specific content, such as images or fonts.

label: System feedback and error handling
description: Problems with how the system communicates with the user, especially regarding errors or system status.

children.label: Error message clarity
children.description: Lack of clear, actionable information in error messages.

children.label: Feedback on actions
children.description: Insufficient or missing feedback after user actions, leaving users uncertain about the result of their input.

label: Navigation and workflow issues
description: Problems related to the structure and sequence of tasks within the application.

children.label: Process clarity
children.description: Uncertainty about the steps needed to complete a task or the status of ongoing actions.

children.label: Step recovery
children.description: Difficulty in reverting to a previous step or undoing an action.

label: User interface and experience issues
description: General issues affecting how users interact with and feel about the software.

children.label: Element selection
children.description: Difficulties selecting and editing specific elements without affecting others.

children.label: Visibility of options and tools
children.description: Issues with finding options, such as color palettes or AI features, suggesting a lack of visibility or intuitive placement.

children.label: Satisfaction
children.description: Overall dissatisfaction with the tool's capabilities or output.

label: Performance and responsiveness
description: Challenges related to the speed and responsiveness of the software.

children.label: System speed
children.description: Delays and slow response times that hinder the user experience.

children.label: System reliability
children.description: Inconsistent performance and failures that disrupt the user workflow.

label: Accessibility and inclusivity issues
description: Problems related to the software being accessible to all users, including those with disabilities.

children.label: Language and localization
children.description: Issues with language input affecting output, indicating a possible need for better language support.

children.label: Accessibility features
children.description: Lack of features that make the software usable by people with various abilities.

label: Help and documentation
description: Issues related to the assistance provided by the software for users to understand and utilize features.

children.label: Instructional support
children.description: A lack of guidance or tutorials on how to effectively use the system.

children.label: Assistive features for detailed tasks
children.description: Need for features that assist in adding detailed information, like event details, to a design.

children.label: Help content accessibility
children.description: Difficulty in accessing or finding help content when faced with an issue.

label: Customization and flexibility
description: Challenges with personalizing and adjusting the software to fit the userâ€™s specific needs.

children.label: Layout and design adaptability
children.description: Difficulty in adapting generated layouts or templates to accommodate specific content or style needs.

children.label: Aesthetic customization
children.description: Challenges in customizing the design to meet a desired visual style or aesthetic.

children.label: Template customization
children.description: Issues with modifying and using templates to create custom designs.

label: AI understanding and generation
description: Issues related to the AI's ability to understand natural language prompts, interpret design intents, and produce results that align with user expectations.

children.label: AI interpretation of prompts
children.description: Problems with the AI not recognizing specific elements or producing unrelated results.

children.label: Element integration and consistency
children.description: Generated elements not integrating well into a cohesive design or inconsistent styles among elements.

children.label: Realism and style match
children.description: Difficulty in generating elements that match the desired style or level of realism.
